column4: well today i bought an asus 1225c netbook and installed 11.10
but i can not play hd video
what video chip does it use?
can you run:  lspci | grep -i vga      what is output?
what is the output of my command please
can you run:  lspci | grep -i vga      what is output?
have you considered using 12.04 rather than 11.10? Precise is LTS and has a later kernel, drivers and Xorg. May help
at first i used 12.04 but there was a problem
the default intel driver should be ok
its in the cog menu in the top right if memory serves?
there is only suspend and shut down
its possible but not advised or supported
I suggest you find a ppa with the app
